summary: A former nazi child-killer is confined in an iron lung inside an old mansion after a suicide attempt. His wife hires him a full-time carer, a mysterious young man who is driven slowly mad by the old man's disturbing past.
cast: Günter Meisner|David Sust|Marisa Paredes|Gisèle Echevarría|Imma Colomer|Josuè Guasch|David Cuspinera|Ricardo Carcelero|Alberto Manzano
title: Tras el cristal
